Pre-Game Insights: The Timberwolves have gone 9-6 in home games. Minnesota is 6-2 in games decided by less than 4 points.
The Celtics are 11-3 on the road. Boston is 9-4 against opponents with a winning record.
The Timberwolves average 14.9 made 3-pointers per game this season, 2.3 more made shots on average than the 12.6 per game the Celtics allow.
The Celtics average 12.2 more points per game (119.6) than the Timberwolves give up to opponents (107.4)
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Edwards is shooting 44.3% and averaging 24.8 points for the Timberwolves.
Jayson Tatum is scoring 28.3 points per game with 9.5 rebounds and 5.5 assists for the Celtics.
The Timberwolves average 105.8 points, 44.8 rebounds, 24.5 assists, 7.9 steals and 5.0 blocks per game while shooting 44.4% from the field.
The Celtics average 118.6 points, 49.6 rebounds, 25.7 assists, 8.2 steals and 5.6 blocks per game while shooting 46.0% from the field.
The Timberwolves have Rob Dillingham: day to day (ankle), Luka Garza: day to day (ankle).
The Celtics have Kristaps Porzingis: day to day (ankle)
Others: The Associated Press created this story using technology provided by Data Skrive and data from Sportradar.
